seo.description: Plattendum គឺជាកម្មវិធីកត់ត្រានូវអ្នកចូលរួមក្នុងព្រឹត្តិការណ៍រហ័ស បង្កើតដោយកូនខ្មែរស្មោះស្នេហ៍ មិនចេះញ៉ែស្រី។

create.policy1: 1. You can only create an event in a timeline with unlimited of duration and attendee as long as you closed the event.
create.policy2: 2. Only you can see the number and detail such as name, date and attending timestamp of the attendee in the event you created.
create.policy3: 3. Once you created the event, you are inaccessible to navigation bar unless you closed the event.
create.policy4: 4. If you close tab or config URL or some other actions that lead to cut off the progress of event, thus event would automatically be ended.
create.policy5: 5. You logically can host only an event at a moment.
create.instruction1: Let your attendee scan this QR code to note into the attendance list.
create.instruction2: If you're on browser, do not close tab, config URL or any acts that lead to cut off the progress of event otherwise the event is automatically ended.
create.terminate_prompt: Are you sure you want to end the event? This action cannot be undone.

join.instruction1: Aim you camera closer to the host’s device to scan QR code. Once you saw the dialogue pops up, you're automatically joined the event.
join.instruction2: If you encounter error or see blank, please give permission to access the CAMERA/WEBCAM otherwise you're not able to scan the QR code.

settings.confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out from your account?
